scripts.dev: bun run dev:app & bun run dev:server & wait
scripts.dev:info: echo 'Development URLs:' && echo 'Frontend: http://localhost:5173/' && echo 'Backend:  http://localhost:3000/' && echo 'Network:' && hostname -I | awk '{print "Frontend: http://"$1":5173/"; print "Backend:  http://"$1":3000/"}'
scripts.build-all: bun run build:app && bun run build:server
scripts.clean: bun run clean:app && bun run clean:server
scripts.type-check: bun run type-check:app && bun run type-check:server
scripts.version:sync: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const pkg=JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync('package.json')); ['wappops-app','wappops-server'].forEach(dir=>{const subPkg=JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync(dir+'/package.json')); subPkg.version=pkg.version; fs.writeFileSync(dir+'/package.json', JSON.stringify(subPkg,null,2)+'\n');})"
